game.name: Stick Panda
game.description:
Your friend cute Panda is stuck and has suddenly planned to move throughout his winter adventure. Do not bother he is not alone, but a handy stretchy stick will also be there to guide him way. Would you like to help him to decide how far to stretch? Join Stick Panda and be prepared to guide your needy friend to help switch from one platform to another! Make sure to guide your Panda safely move to the safe ground.

Remember your friend might tumble down below in case if you stretch the stick too short or too long. Use your logical mind and brain power to make the stick grow perfectly by holding your finger on the mobile screen or clicking your mouse button in this HTML5 puzzle game! Be careful as Panda can only reach to the other side of the platform if the stick reaches the platform perfectly. He will fall down if the stick is not long enough.

It takes your proper guessing power to build a bridge that has a correct length. No need to bother in case if you lose your game as you would have unlimited chances to play game online for free! Do not waste your time anymore! Stay with us to find some more challenging and interesting free arcade challenges! Good luck to stay for as long as possible to top the leaderboards! Have a wonderful merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
